attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap the dole system  , put them all into the national service plus 16 year olds that want to leave school but have no job. 
It will get them of the streets and help our armed forces ,teach them disapline and to respect others get them off there back sides and stop sponging of the tax payers US.
They will have a choice get a job or go into the armed forces help our lads and lases and put something back into our great country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
